相关阅读：美国一小学因天气好放假1天 晴朗天气好出游>>>

The headmaster of a school in Georgia says he plans to cancel classes because of great weather.美国乔治亚州一所学校的校长表示因为天气太好，计划停课放假一天。

Len McWilliams of Calvary Christian School in Columbus says he's calling off classes Friday because of a commitment he made to find a positive reason to cancel classes before he retires at the end of the year.哥伦布市卡弗雷基督学校的校长伦恩-麦克威廉斯表示，他将取消周五的课程，因为他此前许下过承诺，将在今年年底退休前，找个好的理由停课。

McWilliams told the Ledger-Enquirer of Columbus he's had to cancel school because of bad weather for years, and thought he should eventually cancel classes because the weather was just too nice for students and staff to be cooped up all day.麦克威廉斯对哥伦布市的报纸Ledger-Enquirer 表示，这么多年他一直是因为天气不好而停课，他终于能找到一天是因为天气好停课了，这么好的天气同学们和老师们不能整天被关在教室里。

The forecast for the Columbus area calls for sunny skies and a temperature of more than 80 degrees.哥伦布市天气预报周五天气晴好，当地的气温将超过80华氏度（超过26摄氏度）。
